amendment.description: Amendment adds a set of Congressional findings with regard to the enforcement of Federal firearm laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 21 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to establish a set of Congressional findings with regard to the enforcement of Federal firearm violations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 293 - 134 (Roll no. 216).
